textimage.text:
This Pages Prototype project demonstrates the power of the Themes feature of Composum Pages.

A Theme overlays the component and style implementation of a website project. A Theme can be switched without content changes. The existing content of a page is rendered based on the markup and style of the base implementation and the overlays of the Theme.

A Theme can overlay:

  • some templates of a project to modify the page design rules
  • some components of a project to modify the rendered markup
  • the clientlibs of a project to modify the style and behaviour

text_492544420.subtitle: Start Bootstrap
text_492544420.text: This Theme example is using the 'Business Casual' theme available at Start Bootstrap. It demonstrates the use of such a general theme as is. The style is not changed - all overlays are modifications of the Composum Pages Components implementation. This is for demonstration pourposes - normally such a style theme is imported by adjusting the style rules to the Sling components.
